markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Turtle Plate](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1845)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 15 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 3
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Half Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This harness of _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [half plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12)_ is made from the shell plates of a [dragon turtle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=157) and has the [aquadynamic](/Traits.aspx?ID=469) trait. Fashioned from organic material, the suit is one of the few heavy armors not anathema to [druids](/Classes.aspx?ID=6).

<document level="2" id="action-1539" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the shell of a dragon turtle.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dragon Turtle Plate
